title: 11 constituent parties of the Govt to launch new initiative
content: Eleven (11) constituent parties of the Government are set to unveil their joint National Policy on the 2nd of March 2022.The Democratic Freedom Front, Lanka Sama Samaja Party, Sri Lanka Freedom Party, Sri Lanka Communist Party, National Freedom Front, National Congress, Pivithuru Hela Urumaya, Sri Lanka Mahajana Party, Vijaya Dharanai National Council, and the Eksath Mahajana Party are among the constituent parties.The National Policy will be revealed at the Monarch Imperial Hall in Sri Jayaywardenapura at 03.00 pm on the 2nd of March .The party leaders have pointed out that the National Policy consists of short-term and long-term solutions for the current crises in Sri Lanka.They further said it also consists of proposals to further strengthen Sri Lankaâ€™s economy.
